overview: This film was produced by Beijing Xiaolong Film and Television Culture Co., Ltd. and Hunan Di Maqianjiayi Film and Television Co., Ltd. It tells Cao Hua, an antique businessman, long tired of his life, and wanted to finish the last business. Girlfriend Chen Fangyuan went to Gao Fei, but unexpectedly was accounted for in this last business, which led to the failure of the transaction, which led to the killing of the body, then involved the violation of the law and the discipline, and finally got the severe punishment and inner condemnation of the story.
title: 惩戒
